text:
Karrn the Conqueror established the pre-[[Galifar]] nation of [[Karrnath]] about 1,870 years ago (â€“872 YK), defeating the remaining [[goblinoid]] settlements in the area. He then attempted to conquer and unite the other four burgeoning [[human]] kingdoms of [[Khorvaire]], but was unsuccessful.

Other than forming [[Karrnath]], Karrn is also known for writing the [[Analects of War]], for establishing [[Dreadhold]], and possibly even creating the strategy game known as [[Conqueror]]. He is also one of the founders of the religious sect known as the [[Three Faces of War]].
title: Karrn the Conqueror
tooltip: warlord who founded Karrnath 1870 years ago, wrote military treatises still popular today
